GSD.description:
ALSA: oss: Fix PCM OSS buffer allocation overflow

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.1 by commit e74a069c6a7bb505f3ade141dddf85f4b0b5145a. For more details please see the references link.
